spell.name: Alchemical Grenade
spell.components: S, M (a crossbow or firearm, and a piece of ammunition)
spell.text:
You create a alchemical device to be launch at using a crossbow or firearm. When casting the spell roll a d6 to determine the damage type. 1 = Acid 2 = Cold 3 = Fire 4 = Lightning 5 = Poison 6 = Thunder
Ammo Limit: Cannot have more than 3 grenades casted. Cantrip Upgrade: The damage of this spell increases by 1d6 at 5th (2d6), 11th (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).
Source: Justin's Compendium of Spells p. 2 (Homebrew)
